description: Update: New Game mode :) Other apps added.. Rancing Gamemode coming soon === Free version with ads of Pi Master Pro (available thought the apps menu) and longer release cycles.  Unleash the inner geek in you and show off in front of your friends by showing them how many digits of Pi you have memorized.  It's way more fun than any game you have ever played.. whether it's gta or even doodle jump... Nothing compares to it. Love the number, love the game... those are the rules :)  Features: -Type Pi - Learn Pi - Use keypad - Tweet your coolness - Highscore list to show off to your friends  Want a feature? Request it via mail!
